comment:
fermented @ 18C for 10 days, then up to 21 for a couple of days.
Down to 4C for two days, and carbonated in 5L minikegs with 7 and 10 gr table sugar, to determine which carbonation  level is the most appropriate in the future.

Opened the first bottles after a couple of weeks, it's smooth, with a huge coffee and chocolate flavor, it tastes great.
Will brew that again without making any changes.
